item.title: TrueSkill, Technical Report
item.description: The first skill estimator was developed by Arpad Elo, adopted by the World Chess Federations around 1970. TrueSkill is just the bayesian multiplayer version of Elo model, published by Microsoft in 2007. In this technical report I derive, step by step, the analytical solution of the model.

item.title: Display Jupyter Notebooks with Academic
item.description: Learn how to blog in Academic using Jupyter notebooks

item.title: Academic: the website builder for Hugo
item.description: Create a beautifully simple website in under 10 minutes.

I believe that a good social science will provide us with the answers to fundamental problems that life on earth faces in this historical colonial-modern stage. With several colleagues, we are working hard to lay the foundations of an interdisciplinary social sciences research center in Latin America. As a Social Anthropologist, I am currently finishing a PhD in Computer Science, developing the Computational Social Science area in one of the main scientific centers of the southern hemisphere.
